xml:
Oral suspension
Cautionary and advisory labels

Label 9 - Space the doses evenly throughout the day. Keep taking this medicine until the course is finished, unless you are told to stop

Label 21 - Take with or just after food, or a meal

Excipients

May contain

Aspartame, sucrose

Zinnat 125mg/5ml oral suspension <ph outputclass="manufacturer">(GlaxoSmithKline UK Ltd)</ph> 238811000001105

Cefuroxime (as Cefuroxime axetil) 25 mg per 1 ml

  • 70 ml POM

    NHS indicative price = £5.20

CEFUROXIME
